title: Ancient Pilgrimage Road leading to Temple Mount opens to public after 13 years of excavations
description: Archaeologists say the stepped street served as Jerusalem’s main thoroughfare for pilgrims during the Second Temple period.

title: Top 10 Ancient Martial Arts Of India That Still Thrive Today
description: Discover the top 10 ancient martial arts of India, including Kalaripayattu, Silambam, Gatka, Thang-Ta and more. These timeless fighting styles blend combat, culture and tradition.

title: 10,000-year-old porcupine fossil at Ipoh geological heritage site goes missing
description: The fossil was a rare find because it had the teeth and jawbones of the mammal.
